jd: From: Bhavani, Centraprise bhavani@centraprise.com Reply to: bhavani@centraprise.com Job role : Java Tech Lead Location : Pleasanton, CA (Onsite and Hybrid)Job type : ContractExp : 11+ Roles & Responsibilities:Java Developer Skill + Experience in leading 3-4 developers and mentoring the team. Experience in working with Solution Architect for Design and providing recommendations. Perform Design and Code reviews• Strong hands on experience is required on the Core Java, SpringBoot, REST & SOAP Web Services• Good to have experience in IBM MQ, Oracle SQL• Ability to develop SOAP/RESTFUL webservices• Ability to build and deploying spring boot microservices• Ability to write Junit testing• Ability to solve the problem/issue when occurred in QA region• Ability to participate in scrum calls/grooming sessions/stand ups• Ability to work with cross work stream teams• Ability to work with performance team to evaluate and resolve any performance related issues• Ability to work with product support team to troubleshoot any production issue.• Effective written and verbal communication skills and good listening skills• Excellent problem-solving skills - Ability to analyze problem in multiple perspectives• A can-do-attitude and a strong passion for technology and willingness to learn new skills.• Confident, self-starter, have a strong work ethic, and team-oriented!• Responsible for developing and designing front end web architecture, ensuring the responsiveness of applications, and working alongside graphic designers for web design features, among other duties.• Full Stack Developers will be required to see out a project from conception to final product, requiring good organizational skills and attention to detail.• Meeting both technical and consumer needs.Required Skills:• Java API Micro services Spring boot, Google Cloud• Kubernetes, Docker• Has proficient understanding of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and Typescript.• Has worked on Angular 7 and above, developing components and consuming REST APIs.• Has worked on web application development using Java 8+ and Spring MVC/ Spring Boot.• Has thorough knowledge on Unit testing Angular using Jasmine, Karma.• Has knowledge on consuming SOAP services using Spring framework.• Has developed REST Services / API using Spring Boot with any relational / document database as backend.• Has good knowledge on Unit testing REST APIs.• Knowledge on tooling like Node JS, npm, ng cli, Git, Maven, Gradle is needed.Nice to Have Skills:• Good to have implemented Swagger UI in REST Services for interactive UI testing.• Has setup pipeline in GitLab using tools like SONAR, black duck etc., is added advantage• Healthcare domain experience
